thread.title: Man won't marry fiancée until she has wife lessons
thread.title_full: Man won't marry fiancée until she has wife lessons

title: Man won't marry fiancée until she has wife lessons
text: 'Once she learns, the sky's the limit': Man explains why he won't marry the mother of his children until she completes WIFE LESSONS Josh will not marry his partner Rebecca until she 'learns' to become a better wife He demands to have dinner waiting from him when he comes home from work Claims she should use their daughter's nap times to organize the household He said her 'me time' should be spend at the grocery store and that she is lazy Pregnant Rebecca said she feels like a 'prisoner in her own home'
